description: This document describes APIs for accessing data on the system clipboard. It provides operations for overriding the default clipboard actions (cut, copy and paste), and for directly accessing the clipboard contents.
title: Clipboard API and events

versions.title: Clipboard Operations for the Web 1.0: Copy, Paste, Drag and Drop.

description: The EditContext is a new API that allows authors to more directly participate in the text input process.
title: EditContext API

description: This specification defines additions to events for text and related input to allow for the monitoring and manipulation of default browser behavior in the context of text editor applications and other applications that deal with text input and text formatting. This specification builds on the UI events spec.
title: Input Events Level 2

description: This document defines APIs for selection, which allows users and authors to select a portion of a document or specify a point of interest for copy, paste, and other editing operations.
title: Selection API

description: The VirtualKeyboard API provides authors with greater control over the visibility of the virtual keyboard (VK), and greater ability to adapt the layout of web pages when VK visibility changes.
title: VirtualKeyboard API
